title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Language Education Design and Management Competencies Based on Big Five Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Using the Big Five Learning Approach, learners can derive at least three collaboration and communication strategies when designing language learning
In online real-time environments, learners can develop and apply at least two activities that promote learner engagement in language education management
Learners can provide improvement suggestions for learning design outputs based on peer feedback with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
